snippet: The move came as efforts were being made on multiple fronts  to increase the pressure on the government of President Bashar al-Assad of Syria.
abstract: United States will keep American warplanes and antimissile batteries in Jordan, as it ratchets up pressure on Syrian Pres Bashar al-Assad and begins sending arms to Syrian rebels.

byline.original: By MICHAEL R. GORDON and THOM SHANKER
byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by David M. Herszenhorn from Moscow, Kareem Fahim from Cairo and Mayy El Sheikh from Assiut, Egypt.

lead_paragraph: The move came as efforts were being made on multiple fronts  to increase the pressure on the government of President Bashar al-Assad of Syria.

headline.main: U.S. to Keep Warplanes in Jordan, Pressing Syria
headline.print_headline: U.S. to Keep Warplanes In Jordan, Pressing Syria
